message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?

I'm not willing to go all the way down to $105, but I can see you're really interested in the product. I can meet you at $108, which is my lowest price. After that, I'll have to consider other options.

I'm really close to walking away, but I still think the product would be a great fit for me. I'm willing to meet you at $107, but that's my final offer. If you can't meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to meet you at $107. I'm willing to make one final counteroffer: $109. If you're still interested, this is my last price. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.
